project_descr: Project will look into perceptions present in the judiciary on violence in family working to reduce predominant patriarchal stereotypes on gender roles and therefore latent excuse for gender based violence by judiciary representatives

outputs.output_descr: With this Project we are aiming to support achievement of sustainable and efficient system for the protection of victims of domestic violence and sustainable measures to combat violence in family. Focus is to strengthen certain provisions of the Law on Protection of Victims of Violence making sure it is fairly interpreted and implemented in daily practice of courts, and that way ensuring that victims do experience legal protection, but also system-wide support provided by multidisciplinary mechanism.
